Articles.Content:
From the maker(s) of

replica comes Kerbal Impulse, a kerbalized and scaled-down replica of the Solar Impulse.
Javascript is disabled. View full album

The replica was made based on what I remembered what it looked like (in short, it was based entirely on memory), that's why the copy was a little inaccurate (didn't paid attention to some details).

Not to mention that it is much smaller than the original.

An improved version will be coming soon. Also, I hope there are large solar panels (the "slap-always on" type, not the folding ones) for me to use to make it look much more like the original. And finding a way to put them in stock cardboard wings without sinking below so that it can still catch light to keep the batteries recharged...
